## Summary
What would you like to see improved or added?

## Problem / Use Case
Describe the challenge, user need, or gap in the current system.

## Proposed Solution
Outline what you'd expect the feature to do or how it should behave.

## Examples or References
Provide references, screenshots, existing design patterns, or similar examples from other systems.

## Additional Notes
Any constraints, technical considerations, or context you want to highlight.
